skillTree.localised_description: When at war under the canopy it is like the trees themselves join the fray, striking from all directions.
The forest has myriad ways to cause discomfort, pain and death to those foolhardy enough to make unwanted contact with its denizens.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Enhanced by magic, the laws of nature grant the wargrove a heightened ability to heal its ranks from light energy alone.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.
The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker
Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker
Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Regrowth Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Dwellers Below"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Not even the fiercest weather conditions can strike down a hardy and long-lived oak, for it endures all seasons.
A birchâ€™s oils can soften its wood, but once dry can harden branches into lethal clubs of war.
The willow is a harbinger of spring, and a conduit of lifeforces that can bolster a tree to withstand the direst of circumstances.
The Lord embodies the forest; as a result of this, their warriors feel a greater call to defend it.
The Lord's troops are charged to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can pass through trees.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Despairs are among the most feared Spites within Athel Loren, their arrival always foretelling imminent death.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strikes any combatants in its path

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Scurrying over their host with feverish abandon, Netlings snag the weapons of enemies that come too close with webs of magical filaments.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Mirthfully looming out from their host, Terrors take on their most fearsome aspect to dampen the spirits of their horrified prey.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Unleashed upon a foe, these aggressive manifestations of the forest are utilised for their needle-like arrows that inflict painful wounds from afar.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The staring eyes and tattered wings of tiny, glowing Elves befuddle enemy minds, sending them into a sleep-like trance.
Radiants are sponges for magical energy, manifesting as little more than blurred shapes of pure light that beckon the Winds to their host.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +15% for all enemy spells
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Hiding in their hosts' hollows are fiendish forms, ready to strike out at any who draw near.
Shrikes take on various frightening forms, moving like quicksilver to target the eyes, and even enter foesâ€™ bodies to attack their very minds.
Bounding from branch to bow, the Luminescentsâ€™ magical spoors alight upon alliesâ€™ weapons to bestow a minor but lethal enchantment.

effects.description:
Spell resistance: -25%
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.
